coding.display: Defined in handling and category elements

description: This example of a GroupAssignment Profile describes a 3-arm trial (so handling='polychotomous') and lists the 3 trial arms in category.name elements. Because the definition of this EvidenceVariable Resource is fully expressed in the handling and category elements, the defintion.concept element uses a CodeableConcept for 'Defined in handling and category elements'.
